territories.name: Remnant Frontier
territories.plotHook: Remnant activity has spiked in this region. The Hegemony is mobilizing to contain the threat before it spreads.

territories.name: Pilgrims' Reach
territories.plotHook: A lost Luddic shrine has been located in this constellation. The Church wants to reclaim it; others want to exploit it.

territories.name: Domain Cache
territories.plotHook: Scavengers report Domain-era supply caches scattered across these systems. Tri-Tachyon and independents race to recover the technology.

territories.name: Contested Fringe
territories.plotHook: This border region is claimed by multiple factions. Patrols skirmish over mining rights and territorial control.
